page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: I am Richard Kilner,aged 9.Each morning I dress,have breakfast of Rice Krispies with hot milk,and set off for school.After assembly we do maths.We can work as fast as we like.After play we do reading workshop,which I hate most of all,followed by recorder practice.At 12 o'clock it is dinner time.Today I had salad,ham and baked potatoes with shortbread cake and custard for pudding.After dinner I went to the swimming baths at Royston,then back to school for an art lesson,before playing football.When school is over I do my piano practice and play snooker with my dad.Following tea I watch television.When I get tired I have a bath and go to bed.
